kw.name: Criar Booking
POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking path_url=/booking headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '185', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"firstname": "Kaua", "lastname": "Silva", "totalprice": "123", "depositpaid": true, "bookingdates": {"checkin": "2025-09-20", "checkout": "2025-09-25"}, "additionalneeds": "Breakfast"}'

C:\Users\kauar\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\Lib\site-packages\urllib3\connectionpool.py:1097: InsecureRequestWarning: Unverified HTTPS request is being made to host 'restful-booker.herokuapp.com'. Adding certificate verification is strongly advised. See: https://urllib3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/advanced-usage.html#tls-warnings warnings.warn(

Faz POST para criar um novo booking

kw.name: Validar Status Code Criacao
Should Be True

Valida se o status code de criação está correto (200 ou 201)
